From: 
To: 
Subject: Fwd: Re: Little St James Island - Last Deed of Record 
Date: Thu, 08 Aug 2019 16:51:22 +0000 
Inline-Images: pastedImage.png 
FYI. See info below about Epstein's ownership of the island prior to 2011. 
From: 
Date: ug , 
Subject: Re: Little St James Island - Last Deed of Record 
To: 
Cc: 
If you look at the Quitclaim Deed dated 12/23/2011, see the below paragraph. The "Grantor" in 2011 is L.S.J 
LLC (Epstein). 
I could not pull the 1998 Deed on line, but clearly, L.S.J LLC (Grantor) first received the title on 04/27/1998. 
Being rhoâ€¢ same premise. conveyed to Grantor by Warranty 
Deed dated April 27. 1998 and recorded 
May IS, 1998 in Rook 49

and enteral in

of the Recorder of Deeds for St. Thomas

Squad C-40 
(FAST) 
Senior Financial Investigator (SFI) 
From, 
Sent: Wednesday, August 7, 2019 3:45:55 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Little St James Island - Last Deed of Record 
Hey= 
Are you able to pull the deed from the time period 2002-2005? 
EFTA00031702

From 
Sent: Wednesda , Au ust 07, 2019 9:51 AM 
To 
Subject: Little St James Island - Last Deed of Record 
Attached is Last Deed of Record for Little St James Island, dated 12/23/2011, from L.S.I. LLC to Nautilus Inc. 
The sole beneficial owner and President of Nautilus Inc is Jeffrey E. Epstein. 
uad C-40 FAST) Senior Financial Investigator (SFI)
